Actions.Name: Archive a record
Actions.Description: Archive a record. Call this before delete.

Actions.Name: Delete a record
Actions.Description: Delete a record. To delete a record you need to archive first.

Actions.Name: Get all records
Actions.Description:
Gets a list of all records from app.
Can iterate using $top and $skip

Actions.Name: Get basic field info
Actions.Description: Get basic field data for an app

Actions.Name: Get report records
Actions.Description:
Gets a list of records from report, limited to 250 records per request.
Only returns report field data.
Can iterate using $top and $skip

Actions.Name: Patch a Record
Actions.Description: The Softools Api caters for Delta updates, meaning you can send only the changes which are relevant and not the entire document per PATCH request.

Actions.Name: Create a record
Actions.Description: Send all field values including defaults when adding a new record to an App
